title: Ghost Toasters - Regular Show v1.0
description:
Save the park from a ghostly invasion in this REGULAR SHOW PLATFORM SHOOTER! Gear up with the latest high-tech weaponry and toast some killer ghosts!

BATTLE HORDES OF GHOSTS!
Hot Dog Guy loves his hot dogs extra hot, with lots of ghost peppers. But when Mordecai and Rigby accidentally knock his savory snack into the graveyard, its supernatural spice summons an army of ancient ghosts.

PLAY AS 13 UNIQUE CHARACTERS!
Unleash a spooky smackdown with a huge variety of characters. Play as Mordecai, Rigby, Pops, Margaret, Eileen, Baby Ducks, Thomas, Skips, Muscle Man, Benson, Guardian of Eternal Youth, Gary and Techmo. 
Each character features a unique attack and upgradeable skill tree, and you'll need to master all of them to conquer the game.

UNLOCK FANCY COSTUMES!
Every member of your crew has two or more costumes, and these fancy duds aren't just for looks, since each costume enhances that character with a special power. Unlock all the costumes, then equip the best ones to fit your style of play.

EARN POWER-UPS GALORE!
Evil spirits don't have a ghost of a chance when you activate awesome power-ups like strength buffs, speed boosts, pickle shields, invincible golf carts and The Power.

CAN YOU BEAT ALL 40 LEVELS?
Ghost portals are everywhere, and it'll take a lot of work to clean up all 40 levels. And if you can earn three stars on a level, you'll score some sweet coin bonuses.

Become a phantom-blasting phenomenon in GHOST TOASTERS!

More info:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.turner.ghosttoasters" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.turner.ghosttoasters</a>


Instructions:

1.Copy 'com.turner.ghosttoasters' folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb'
2.Install APK
3.Launch the game
